src:
Naslovne strane za petak, 1. novembar 2019. godine

01 Nov 2019, 07:50

Dnevne novine u izdanjima za 1. novembar, na naslovnim stranama pišu o navodima da je predsednik beogradske Opštine Stari grad Marko Bastać tukao kuma zbog spora oko novca, najavljuju otvaranje renovirane zgrade "Palate pravde" u Beogradu, pišu i o planiranoj selidbi službi državnog vrha u Palatu Srbija, kao i o pogibiji dvoje turskih radnika na gradilištu u Čortanovcima.ALO  -  "Rodjena braća poginula na gradilištu" o pogibiji dvojice turskih radnika na gradilištu u Čortanovcima.BLIC  -  "Predsedništvo i Vlada sele se u Palatu Srbija", najavljuje list. "Makron se ne protivi članstvu Srbije u EU", o izjavi ambasadora Francuske u Srbiji Žan-Luj Falkoni o planu predsednika te države Emanuela Makrona.VEČERNJE NOVOSTI  -  NATO želi da zakoči isporuku 'pancira'?", o navodima da su za vreme vežbe Srbije i Rusije dva izvidjačka aviona alijanse neprekidno letela duž Drine. "Bastać me je vezao i tukao devet sati", kaže kum Marka Bastaća.DANAS  -  "Za smrt stotinu radnika niko nije odgovarao", o tragedijama na gradilištima Srbije. "Za sada bez novog formata razgovora vlasti i opozicije", o susretu Predsednice Odbora Evropskog parlamenta za stabilizaciju i pridruživanje Srbije Evropskoj uniji Tanje Fajon sa liderima Saveza za Srbiju.INFORMER  -  "Marko Bastać me tukao i stavljao mi kesu na glavu" list prenosi  navode da je predsednik beogradske Opštine Stari grad Marko Bastać tukao kuma zbog spora oko novca. "Od ponedeljka opet +20" o produženom Miholjskom letu u Srbiji.KURIR  -  "Od danas obavezne zimske gume, kazne do 20.000" o tome da su od 1. novembra obavezne zimske gume za motorna vozila.POLITIKA  -  "Od početka godine 17 radnika stradalo na gradilištima" u Srbiji. "Porez na donacije kao kazna za humanost", o sanitetskom vozilu koje je poklonio Milomir Glavčić iz Kanade i na njega platio porez 7.000 evra.SRPSKI TELEGRAF   -  "Moj kum Bastać me tukao jer mu nisam dao pare od reketa. Šok svedočenje Lazara Lešnjaka, bivšeg člana Veća opštine Stari grad", piše list.
text:
Cover pages for Friday, November 1, 2019

01 Nov 2019, 07:50

The daily newspapers in the November 1 issue, on the front pages, write about allegations that Belgrade Mayor Marko Bastac was beating a godfather over a dispute over money, announce the opening of the renovated "Palace of Justice" building in Belgrade, and the planned relocation of the state top Palace of Serbia, as well as the killing of two Turkish workers at a construction site in Cortanovci.ALO - "Born brothers killed at a construction site" on the death of two Turkish workers at a construction site in Cortanovci.BLIC - "The Presidency and the Government move to the Palace of Serbia", the newspaper announced. "Macron does not oppose Serbia's EU membership," on statement by French Ambassador to Serbia Jean-Louis Falconi on the plan of that country's President, Emmanuel Macron. EVENING - NATO wants to delay delivery of 'armor'? ", Alleging that during the exercise Serbia and Russia had two Alliance reconnaissance aircraft constantly flying along the Drina River. "The Bastac tied me up and beat me for nine hours," says godfather Marko Bastac. TODAY - "No one was responsible for the death of a hundred workers," about the tragedies on the construction sites of Serbia. new format of government and opposition talks, "on the meeting of Tanja Fajon, the President of the European Parliament's Committee on Stabilization and Association of Serbia with the leaders of the Alliance for Serbia.INFORMER -" Marko Bastac beat me and put my bag on my head " Stari Grad Municipalities Marko Bastac Beats Godfather over Dispute over Money. "+20 Monday" on Extended Miholjski Flight to Serbia.CURIR - "From today mandatory winter tire, fines d o 20,000 "on the fact that winter tires for motor vehicles are required as of November 1. POLITICS -" Since the beginning of the year 17 workers have been killed on construction sites "in Serbia. "Tax on donations as a punishment for humanity," on a medical vehicle donated by Milomir Glavcic from Canada and paid a tax of 7,000 euros on it. SERBIAN TELEGRAPH - "My godfather Bastac beat me because I didn't give him money from a racket. Shock testimony of Lazar Lesnjak. former member of the Stari Grad Municipal Council, "the newspaper writes.
